page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT SURVEY
page.content: A large proportion of the area is covered by farmland.Nevertheless a study of the residential area within the block shows that a large proportion of the male{occupations}fit into the{professional}category.Some examples of these are Managing Director,teacher and Judge. There are also at least 7 male occupations in the block which fit into the{skilled}category,for example plumber,carpet-fitter and gas-fitter. None of the jobs can fit into the {manual}category. None of the male participants in the survey are unemployed although 58% of the women are housewives.Out of the other 42% 5 jobs fitted into the professional category,which includes teacher and pharmacist.Which leaves 2 jobs in the skilled category and 1 in the manual category.
